AcceptLanguage.description: The language code to use for this operation. Supported language codes are as follows: 'en' (English) 'jp' (Japanese) 'zh' (Chinese) If no code is specified, 'en' is used as the default.

AddTags.description: Tags to add to the existing list of tags associated with the portfolio.

Description.description: The updated text description of the portfolio.

DisplayName.description: The name to use for display purposes.

Id.description: The identifier of the portfolio for the update request.

ProviderName.description: The updated name of the portfolio provider.

RemoveTags.description: Tags to remove from the existing list of tags associated with the portfolio.
